definition: blue-black berries similar to American blueberries
details:
noun
- blue-black berries similar to American blueberries
= synonyms: whortleberry
- erect blueberry of western United States having solitary flowers and somewhat sour berries
= synonyms: thin-leaved bilberry
- erect European blueberry having solitary flowers and blue-black berries
= synonyms: whortleberry, whinberry, blaeberry
